item.title: Bob Marley & The Wailers - Lively Up Yourself - Key of C - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song Lively Up Yourself by Bob Marley & The Wailers from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: C, F.

item.title: Bob Marley & The Wailers - Exodus - Key of Am - Daniel Simmons
item.description: Play along video for the song Exodus by Bob Marley & The Wailers from the channel Daniel Simmons. Chords used in the song: Am.

item.title: Bob Marley & The Wailers - Redemption Song - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Redemption Song by Bob Marley & The Wailers from the channel Ukeledu Music. Chords used in the song: Am, C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Bob Marley & The Wailers - Three Little Birds - Key of A - Kevin Way
item.description: Play along video for the song Three Little Birds by Bob Marley & The Wailers from the channel Kevin Way. Chords used in the song: A, D, E7.
